attributes.action: Give an immediate knighthood to Mr Tom Moore, for his amazing NHS fundraising.
attributes.background:
To give an immediate knighthood to Mr Tom Moore, 99 years of age, for his astounding fundraising for NHS charity.
Mr Moore has outstripped the giving of all the knighted business men such as Branson.The Queen should more than happy to bestow this on an a

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
